Welcome !

- This *First lesson* is the introduction of the Basic Economics Class
- Main topics are
  + Course organisation
  + Introductory topics in economics
  + Experimentation / Case Study / Exercises
- *First* period of the class will use [handout](/pdf/001_BEIE_Introduction.pdf)
- *Second* part will be based on experimentation (see below)

**After** this lesson:

  - Student works
    + Reading the [Production Chapters](/pdf/Production_Krugman_Economics-2.pdf)
    + Group work: Case study presentation on [production cases](/pdf/Exercises_and_Cases.pdf) - (08/10/2020)
       * Pick a case to study in production between **8.1 - 8.13**
       * This is a team work: subscribe on [Production Googlesheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lAzoPYPRt6jUZRFZqgK2R9EPZW4jqVHgUR3IAD19nQc/edit#gid=0) for group describtion and topic choice
       * Statements: **3 slides presentation**
         + 1 slide: Introduction of the case
         + 1 slide: Defining the economics topics usefull to analyse the case
         + 1 slide: Case analysis: either by graph, model, equation, etc. based on your former definitions
